skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: I have a personal project experience in front-end web application development.I was worked on different languages of front-end devlopment in different projects. like HTML, Css, Ejs and React.js and also know the basics of Flutter framework.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: I have an Internship experience in back-end web application development, where I was worked on Entity360 feature project using Spring Boot and PostgreSql and I have devloped some personal projects using Node.js and Express.js with SQL and NoSQL Databases.

portfolio.title: Shopping-Site-app
portfolio.description: It is a simple shopping-site web application,which is developed to demonstrate the usage of EJS, Express.js,Node.js,MongoDB,JWT,    bcrypt

portfolio.title: Employee-Management-System
portfolio.description: Employee Management System is a back-end web application which is used for managing an employee details.It is developed by using Sping Boot and PostgreSql.

portfolio.title: Placements Management System
portfolio.description: Placements Managemnet System is a Web Application, which is used for managing placements in institutions.It is developed by using React.js,Firebase.
